detectors.description:
ERC20Standard.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20Standard.sol#36-42) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- require(bool)(balances[_recipient] + _value >= balances[_recipient]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20Standard.sol#38)
	- balances[msg.sender] -= _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20Standard.sol#39)
	- balances[_recipient] += _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20Standard.sol#40)
	- onlyPayloadSize(2 * 32) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20Standard.sol#36)
